bibl.title: Callimachus and His Critics.
bibl.note: "Much of the book is in fact more a prolegomena to the study of Hellenistic (and also Roman) poetry than a study of Callimachus alone. It is a social as much as a literary history of Greek poetry in the early third century."
CAMERON Alan, Callimachus and His Critics.
Princeton, New Jersey, Princeton University Press, 1995, 8Â°, xiv-534 pp. ISBN 0-691-04367-1. $37.50.
